name: PullRequestDescription
description: Update pull request descriptions during pipeline runs
author: Joachim Dalen

inputs.name: content
inputs.label: Content
inputs.helpMarkDown: The content to append or replace original description with. For Markdown syntax, see [Syntax guidance for basic Markdown usage](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=823918)

inputs.name: useDefined
inputs.label: Use defined id
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set, overrides the value from `System.PullRequest.PullRequestId`

inputs.name: pullRequestId
inputs.label: Pull Request Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: If no id is given, the value from `System.PullRequest.PullRequestId` is taken. If a value is given, this overrides the value from `System.PullRequest.PullRequestId`

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the output variable containing the description

inputs.name: isOutput
inputs.label: Is output
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set, `outputVariable` is set as output and accessible from other jobs

inputs.name: stripIdentifiers
inputs.label: Strip Identifiers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will strip internal identifers used by the task
